TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class CodeCompiler : System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator, System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CodeCompiler extends System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator implements class System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler
Public MustInherit Class CodeCompiler Inherits CodeGenerator Implements ICodeCompiler
public ref class CodeCompiler abstract : System::CodeDom::Compiler::CodeGenerator, System::CodeDom::Compiler::ICodeCompiler

summary.span: 提供 接口的示例实现。

span.span: Provides an example implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是为派生自以便提供编译函数的代码的代码生成器的有用的实用工具基类。 is a useful utility base class for code generators to derive from in order to provide code compilation functions. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含链接要求，并且在类级别应用于所有成员继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时，将引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

permission.span: 直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码使用。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
